sub_title: Head of Quality & Regulatory, Connect&Control Solutions at Varex Imaging
summary:
▪ Currently Global Quality Assurance & Regulatory Affairs Head of the Business Group Connect&Control Solutions, part of Varex Imaging Corporation, a World leader in X-Ray imaging medical devices and components such as tubes, generators, high-voltage connectors, collimators, etc...
Leader of a multi-disciplinary team of QA/RA Managers and Specialists across 4 different sites (The Netherlands, Philippines, China and USA) and member of the Business Group Management Team.
▪ 10+ years of experience in the Medical Device Industry and in the Q&R domain through different roles with increasing responsibilities and covering multiple equipment: Rehabilitation Devices, Implantable Pacemakers and Defibrillators, Haemodialysis Machines, Imaging devices, etc...
▪ Expert on Worldwide Regulations and Standards with proven track of successful Submissions and Certifications (e.g. FDA 510(k), MDD/MDR, Chinese NMPA, Brazilian ANVISA/INMETRO/Anatel, etc...)
▪ Certified auditor and experienced auditee including several FDA inspections
▪ Speaker and Moderator at several International Q&R Conferences, including RAPS, MedTech Summit and others
▪ Flexible, open-minded, problem solver, excellent organizational and adaptation skills
▪ Tech lover, saxophonist, sports fan (soccer, swimming), travel enthusiast
